name: Brandays Designworks
tag_list: design, logotype, identity, brand, logo, 3d, adv
overview:
Branding and graphic design studio Brandays Designworks was founded in Ukraine in 1997. We create integrated design solutions that work for our clients’ advance. Brandays specializes in production enterprise restyling, visual communication, logos and corporate identity. We control the largest project case of industrial branding in Ukraine. Today, our team consists of 30 professionals in three countries, who are working on a permanent and project basis.

Inspiration and recommendations make up a huge part of purchasing power in today’s competitive world, clients themselves become carriers of brand-messages. Brand is a connecting link. Brand is an adherent point. Added value is 9 times higher than product value.

Brand is the only distinctive feature, a source of advantage and influence. Companies do not just sell products and services any more. Clients buy a life style, imbedded experiences, impressions, and breathtaking story.

We believe that design is made to work. Our solutions in the field of branding are the main part of your business intangible asset and investment. Money invested in graphic design are returned as the value capitalization of intangible assets (Goodwill). You get a modern, visually appealing brand, strategy, identity, flawless level of advertising and presentation materials. The result of our work provides additional competitive advantage.
